name: Camp Chef YK60LW Yukon Two Burner Range Camp Stove

reviews.name: Camp Chef YK60LW Yukon Two Burner Range Camp Stove
reviews.reviewText: This is a heavy duty stove,ideal for what we needed,we have a toy hauler with a small kitchen and stove,it gets very hot in there when your cooking so i wanted to cook outside,my wife always had problems with the coleman kerosine two ring stove we had so i wanted something easy to use that didn't need constant refills of gas{this uses the larger propane bottle},the Yukon rocks,we never raised the gas above low and cooked steaks ,burgers, pasta, pretty much everything on the griddle and stove top.Two of the people we camped with were so impressed they say they are now going to purchase Camp Chef stoves.The legs and body of the stove feel sturdy and it was a pretty easy cleanup,the griddle which you have to buy separately works great ,but you must follow the instructions on griddle prep. or its a messy cleanup,if you've used cast iron pans you know what i am talking about. All in all a great buy,a little more expensive than most and a little heavier{you wouldn't want to carry this in too far} but i think this stove was built to last. Yours Scallywag
reviews.title: Yukon range

reviews.name: Camp Chef YK60LW Yukon Two Burner Range Camp Stove
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for something that was close to industrial equipt. that was portable, sturdy,and would put out the BTU's I needed to do a couple of stir fry entries for the Roadkill Cook-off in Marlington,WV . Receiving 3rd place and the Peoples Choice Award for General Tso's Cat(chicken) and Kung Pow Panda(pork). Also have taken it on camping trips. This piece of equipment(camp chef yukon range) is highly recommended 5 stars!!!
reviews.title: A great help at the Cook-off!!

reviews.name: Camp Chef YK60LW Yukon Two Burner Range Camp Stove
reviews.reviewText: I have owned this unit for several weeks now. I have used it almost everyday and haven't found a problem yet. This stove has a true low setting unlike other units and is large enough for two large fry pans. The legs are adjustable and sturdy. This stove is a great prouct and the price is even better. I am so glad I chose this stove over the other options.
reviews.title: Great Buy

reviews.name: Camp Chef YK60LW Yukon Two Burner Range Camp Stove
reviews.reviewText: Allows us to have a second kitchen in the great outdoors.
reviews.title: Great accessory for our travel trailer

reviews.name: Camp Chef YK60LW Yukon Two Burner Range Camp Stove
reviews.reviewText: Great stove. Easy to set up and break down. It has two adjustable burners that get blazing hot with lots of room for large pots or pans. Seems to be well made and sturdy. When I unpacked the stove to test it I experimented with bacon (I think I need the griddle they sell) and it was very easy to clean.
reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do.
